# isComplete

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the action has been performed by the provider.

## Declaration

```swift
var isComplete: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is initialized to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], and is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when either the [doc://com.apple.callkit/documentation/CallKit/CXAction/fulfill()] or [doc://com.apple.callkit/documentation/CallKit/CXAction/fail()] method is called.

## See also

### Related Documentation

- [doc://com.apple.callkit/documentation/CallKit/CXAction/fulfill()]
- [doc://com.apple.callkit/documentation/CallKit/CXAction/fail()]

## Accessing Action Attributes

- **uuid**: The unique identifier for the action.
- **timeoutDate**: The time after which the action cannot be completed.
